title: Conversations for Power and Possibility
description: A true story of how the author turned around a downward spiral in the economic crisis of 2009 and how you can do the same today. This is a hopeful book. It's about finding new sources of power when you feel powerless and new possibilities when you feel stuck. It's about choosing a creative response to any challenge that arises in your life. For anyone who finds themselves drawn into a downward spiral by bad news, negative people, and "one thing after another". The four conversations help "Shows us how to create the future we want. Highly recommended." -MARILEE ADAMS, Ph.D., author of  Change Your Questions, Change Your 10 Powerful Tools for Life and Work"Darlene Chrissley's four conversations -- or, really, the four questions that start these conversations -- are the key to getting unstuck and back in control." -MICHAEL BUNGAY STANIER, author of  Do More Great Work  and Senior Partner, Box of Crayons"A great read for getting unstuck in work, life, or spirit." -LOUISE TAYLOR GREEN, Vice President, HR, OD, Corporate Strategy, Hamilton Health Services
author: Darlene Chrissley
